WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is because of the Node type defined in lib.d.ts for the DOM APIs. You'll find this pattern works correctly for other names.
WorkItem.Description:
Just need to define a recusive tree data structure so a node can contain optional child nodes.

But this code: 

```
class Node {
  n : Node;
}
```

gets a compile error: 

```
error TS2000: Duplicate identifier 'Node'.
```

am using 0.9.0.0
WorkItem.Summary: Compile error on recursive class def
